data.title: Open Payment API
data.description: 【ウェブペイメント】第1回 PayPay Integration Webinar

sub_title.title: Introducing PayPay Online Payment - Web Payment -
sub_title.description_1: This video introduces PayPay's Web Payment of online payments.

sub_title.title: What is Web Payment
sub_title.description_1: Web payment is one of the online payment patterns provided by PayPay.
sub_title.description_2: The payment is completed by the user on the payment page created by the API.

data.title: Open Payment API
data.description: 【ネイティブペイメント】第2回 PayPay Integration Webinar

sub_title.title: Introducing PayPay Online Payments - Native Payment -
sub_title.description_1: This video introduces PayPay's Native Payment of online payments.

sub_title.title: What is Native Payment
sub_title.description_1: Native Payment is one of the online payment patterns provided by PayPay.
sub_title.description_2: The first step is to link the merchant service to the user's PayPay account.
sub_title.description_3: Using the user identifier returned by PayPay at the time of account linkage, the merchant service can debit the user's wallet directly from the merchant service to complete the payment.
